dcterms:description: The MS COCO dataset is used for person segmentation in the proposed runner re-identification system, specifically for segmenting persons in running videos.
dcterms:title: MS COCO dataset

dcterms:creator: J. Deng
W. Dong

dcterms:description: The ImageNet dataset is used for fine-tuning the EfficientNet model in the runner classification step of the proposed system.
dcterms:title: ImageNet dataset

dcterms:description: A dataset created for the study, consisting of running practice videos captured to evaluate the proposed runner re-identification system.
dcterms:title: Running scene image dataset

dcterms:description: A dataset created for the study, used for fine-tuning models such as the runner classifier and shoe detector.
dcterms:title: Dataset for runner re-identification for daily practice

dcterms:creator: A. Penate-Sanchez
D. Freire-Obregon
A. Lorenzo-Melian
J. Lorenzo-Navarro
M. Castrillon-Santana
dcterms:description: The TGC20ReID dataset is referenced as a dataset for sport event re-identification in the wild, although it is not used directly in this study.
dcterms:title: TGC20ReID dataset
